title: Open Science Textbook Development Workshop: VR-Based Lifelong Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies to develop open educational resources using VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can understand the Open Educational Resources (OER) licensing system and select appropriate Creative Commons (CC) licenses
Learners can develop an open textbook prototype visualizing scientific concepts in a mobile VR environment
Learners can derive improvements for open textbooks through user experience (UX) testing

resources: Free version of VR production software
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
